website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option that can be used in the bathroom or the kitchen.
pros: Raised wire grid keeps soap dry while the tray keeps counters free from soap scum
Durable stainless steel construction and rustproof finish
Available in multiple colors to match all fixtures
cons: Soap sometimes sticks to the wire grid upon lifting
No feet to keep it from sliding

customer_reviews.title: top grate keeps lifting off
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the design, and the color and metal of the product is great! However, whenever I pick up soap, it lifts up the top portion (strain grate) from the bottom, so I have to constantly pry it off. This seems to happen because the soap dries on it, which is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: bionicman

customer_reviews.title: Good design, finish is failing.
customer_reviews.text: Product is functional, correctly sized and prevents a bath-size bar of soap from turning mushy (the bar easily dries overnight.) The painted or powder coated finish is attractive but failing prematurely on the crossed wire tray insert. Rust is evident after a short period of use on the insert where the wires cross.
customer_reviews.author: abmartin

customer_reviews.title: I almost made a mistake!  Whew I didn't
customer_reviews.text: I was going to try just one...then I figured they looked so nice and match my fixtures... what the heck...get three! Which I did. Not always are the dispensers and liquid soap practice. At the cabin when we are all there we can go through a bottle in one weekend. Real soap still works. I have one for my laundry room for the bar of Fels Naptha (for removing grease stain on clothes)...one at the cabin and one in the tub. Very attractive, easy to clean, nice color. Just what I wanted..dry soap on both sides
customer_reviews.author: JustJNL

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials - well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled our master bath and used rubbed bronze fixtures. We wanted matching soap dishes to put in our new shower niche. They are exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Will rust with daily use
customer_reviews.text: To prevent rust, spray with Rust-oleum matte clear b4 use
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to find a soap dish that matched my oil rubbed bronze bathroom fixtures with such a great price. I ordered two! One for me and one for my husband! These are light weight, but sturdy. The color is rich and they do not look cheap. I love the grating allows the water to fall through and be caught in the tray. These were packed very well and had no damage during transport.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This little soap dish was exactly what I've been looking for! Functional, easy to clean, keeps our bar of soap elavated and dry - not "goopy" so it lasts longer. Our bar of hand soap is black so it can really create a mess, especially when our grandson enthusiastically uses it! This soap tray has been a big help in alleviating that little problem. It arrived as expected in a timely manner and was as described.
customer_reviews.author: POLLY

customer_reviews.title: Functional and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I recently did a bathroom remodel and went from stainless steel to oil rubbed bronze finishes. I purchased this product after I realized the shower caddy I just bought didn't have a holder for a bar of soap. Actually I really like this soap dish much easier to keep clean than having soap build up on a shower caddy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tattooednurse1

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and works for what I wanted it for .I bought this to keep the sponge from my kitchen sink got tired of people just leaving it in the sink and then putting dirty dishes on top of it and then having to try and find it Now if I can only get the other people in the house to put the sponge on it after they are done using it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I'm All About Bar Soap Now
customer_reviews.text: Since no one has any of the liquid kitchen soap any more, I have switched to the old reliable. Needing something for it to sit on, I found this two-piece beauty that fits perfectly on my kitchen sink. The soap doesn't sit in any wetness, it all drains into the bottom half. The oatmeal soap I bought for it is the perfect size. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Ink and Page

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: This soap dish tray is well made and there appear to be no defects. The bronze finish works well with my bath décor. I haven't used it yet, so I can't say how durable it is. I do have other similar items from the same manufacturer, and have not had any issues. The soap dish does not have a foam covered bottom, it can be used in the shower - no soggy foam to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: PinkLipstick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty finish
customer_reviews.text: This has a beautiful finish and perfectly matched my bathroom fixtures. I am on my second set in less than 9 months. The first one was rusting. It is easy to drain off the soap scum and buildup, but the catch tray underneath has to be cleaned periodically. Don’t use a soft bar of soap, or you will end up with crosshatching impressions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Fine. It's a soap dish. It does look quite nice though and I like how it comes apart for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra

customer_reviews.title: Two piece soap dish
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Surprised and pleased that it is metal, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: David A Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap dish for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap dish because I was tired of my soap always lying in a small puddle of water. Since it has a grate, the soap is always out of any water that may come off it when you use it. Sometimes soap will stick a little bit to the grate, but it doesn't take much effort to break it loose. Awesome soap dish for the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Rein

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase of this soap dish, and I think the most important thing I can say on its behalf is that it is not only attractive (bronze color), but it is also so easy to clean! Just rinse under water and clean! I do not use the grating (top tray) that comes with it; I use a soap saver instead. But the product is terrific, and if you need a good, functioning, hassle free soap dish that will prolong the life of your soap and is durable like the rock of Gibraltar, then you can't go wrong with this! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very Impressed with the weight and size. Remolded my kitchen and I like to have my sponges out and did not want anything hanging or stuck to my new granite composite sink. This dish fits a scotch brite sponge perfectly. Gives a touch of class to a to an ordinary sponge. Update 09/28/2018. Purchased this Feb 2017. No rust. Finish is still like new. Very happy with product
customer_reviews.author: DebbyS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soap and razors
customer_reviews.text: I use this in both my kitchen and in my shower. Love it in the kitchen because I don't have soap reside everywhere. Same with the shower, but the added benefit is that it is perfect for my razor too!
customer_reviews.author: Alex_KC

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap dish. It fits a large bar of soap and is very attractive. Looks very nice on my vanity! I haven't had to clean it yet so can't comment. As for durability I've only had it a few days. I'll update of there's a problem in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality item, made of metal, not plastic, and with a textured bronze finish and a lattice grid to suspend the soap above the water that drips through to the underneath tray. I actually use it for a sponge kept near the sink, since I do not use bar soap, and it fits an ordinary kitchen sponge perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Applewhite MinyardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. It makes displaying my soap more fun, would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Study nice looking soapdish
customer_reviews.text: right size sturdy easy to clean. I wanted a brown bronzy looking soap dish. This is classy but has to be cleaned frequently not because of the product but because soap scum shows up more on a dark dish. I will probably buy another
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this solution much better than my traditional soap dish. Easy to clean and looks really nice with my other oiled bronze fixtures
customer_reviews.author: ChavezChavez

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Shopped around and bought a couple of others that didn't work out (rusted etc.). These are well made and not only have they not rusted, they look and function great as well.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Soap Dish At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality soap dish that is durable and can beautifully accentuate your bathroom decor. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love these, bought one then bought another!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for both bathrooms. Nice quality! Very happy . Durable and nice stylish design too. Very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. MccAin

customer_reviews.title: I like this thing
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing :-) . I'm sure it would be great for soap but I keep my bathroom water glass turned upside down on it so the minerals of our hard water don't accumulate on it and it doesn't sit in a puddle of bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Sian

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very good, but the packaging does not provide proper protection during transportation. The inside part scratches the outer part , therefore the product came with scratched edges. Otherwise i would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Blant

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and haven't rusted yet -- but larger than I expected. The bar of soap I am using it with looks awkwardly small with the dish. Maybe I should look into getting larger bars of soap?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doe it's job and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent even color. Easy use and keeps bar soap dry and prevents wasteful melting.
customer_reviews.author: Mred

customer_reviews.title: Yay for draining soap dish
customer_reviews.text: Expensive appearance and better than ‘typical’ soap dishes. No more stuck soap and/or mushy soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unattractive as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The soap dish just wasn’t as attractive tractive as I expected. It’s slightly large so you need room for it on your vanity! It’s OK... but not for me!
customer_reviews.author: pkickham

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a good soap dish & tray. It's currently keeping some bar soap high and dry next to my kitchen sink. It looks well made. I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jabberwock713

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple, elegant, attractive soap dish. Our soap stays clean, and the dish looks great and is easy to clean!

customer_reviews.title: Classy solid soap dish
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soap dish with some weight for stability. No slipping and sliding like the cheap ones sometimes do. Looks nice by my sink.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice on sink and keeps our sponges from smelling too soon. When the sponges are a week old or so I put them in bleach solution to clean.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Great soapdish
customer_reviews.text: We have two in the master bath - look great. When we need one somewhere else, I'll get this again.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps soap from sitting in water
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sleek design and effectively keeps soap dry when not in use. Before this, our soap was sitting in a puddle of water after each use and it was pretty gross. This thing works great to prevent that!

customer_reviews.title: and product soap dish is perfect. The grille allows water to drain into the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came in record time, packaging was intact, and product soap dish is perfect. The grille allows water to drain into the dish, and thus the bar is easier to handle while using. Color matches our faucets! Price was very competitive.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works great and it keeps our soap from melting. It is durable and nice looking

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean; keeps soap from sitting in water; soap stays put and doesn't slide off/out of the dish. This is my second one; I've had one in our master bathroom for 4 years and wanted another for the guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: J. Friesen

customer_reviews.title: great soap dish
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and just what I was looking for. This is a totally metal tray top to bottom. I use this in the shower, soap sits on a metal grid above the metal tray, water drains down and soap stays dry.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great for extra large bars of soap on the counter.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution...

customer_reviews.title: water sits in bottom

customer_reviews.title: i like the fact that i can drain it if there ...

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful bronze color which fits our decor
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job well. No soap staining. It holds up to the water without rusting. It's a beautiful bronze color which fits our decor.

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t cleaned it yet, but I love the color and sturdiness, I actually use it on my kitchen for a sponge caddy (all the suction ones and all didn’t last)

customer_reviews.title: Atrractive Practical Soap Dish

customer_reviews.title: like the bronze color

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap rAck end dish
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap rAck end dish.! I have been looking for something to put my soap on to dry before I put it back in its cardboard box. This works perfectly I can carry the soap back to my room in the dish and then put the soap on the little rack to dry out. I also like the material and that it is not flimsy so it seems like it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Fine elegant looking product.
customer_reviews.text: Great for sponges, scrubs and a hand food brush. We use two of these, one at each rear corner of the kitchen sink. The coloring is pleasant and reflects quality. Has been a two and half months and no sign of corrosion or rust or such. If you're the type to put very wet items on it, the grate lifts out for easy cleaning. :)

product_meta.title: mDesign Metal 2-Piece Soap Dish Tray with Drainage Grid and Holder for Kitchen Sink Countertops to Store Soap, Sponges, Scrubbers - Rust Resistant - Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:BronzeThe design kitchen sink ware collection is the perfect addition to your kitchen. This two-piece soap dish allows soaps and sponges to drain without the mess. Made of durable steel.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR DRAINAGE: The gridded wire insert promotes air circulation, allowing bar soap, sponges, brushes and scrubbers to quickly air dry; The base tray catches excess water keeping kitchen counters and sinks clean, dry and soap scum free; Tray is easy to empty and clean; Holds most sizes of bar soap, hand-made soaps, scrub brushes, brillo pads, vegetable brushes and more

COMPACT DESIGN: This superior quality, slim design soap dish fits nicely on kitchen, bathroom, laundry and utility sink countertops - even when space is limited; Slippery soaps stay conveniently in place, and dry quickly and more completely to save soap and money; Great for kitchens in campers, RVs, apartments, condos and more

DRY COUNTERS: Raised outer edges keep water contained and off of kitchen counters; Gridded tray keeps bar soap and sponges raised for quicker and more complete drying in between uses; When soap is dry simply remove the gridded tray and empty excess water into the kitchen sink for hassle free clean up
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of strong steel wire with a durable rust-resistant finish; Easy Care - Wipe clean with damp cloth
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 4" x 5.7" x .8" high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars582 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
